@charset "UTF-8";
.no-transition {
  transition: none !important;
}

@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .gutter-0px {
    padding-left: 0px;
    padding-right: 0px;
  }
  .gutter-0px &gt; .row {
    margin-right: 0px;
    margin-left: 0px;
  }
  .gutter-0px &gt; .row &gt; .col, .gutter-0px &gt; .row &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-left: 0px;
    padding-right: 0px;
  }
  .gutter-0px__vertical-spacer {
    margin-top: 0px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .gutter-12px {
    padding-left: 6px;
    padding-right: 6px;
  }
  .gutter-12px &gt; .row {
    margin-right: -6px;
    margin-left: -6px;
  }
  .gutter-12px &gt; .row &gt; .col, .gutter-12px &gt; .row &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-left: 6px;
    padding-right: 6px;
  }
  .gutter-12px__vertical-spacer {
    margin-top: 12px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .gutter-20px {
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 10px;
  }
  .gutter-20px &gt; .row {
    margin-right: -10px;
    margin-left: -10px;
  }
  .gutter-20px &gt; .row &gt; .col, .gutter-20px &gt; .row &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 10px;
  }
  .gutter-20px__vertical-spacer {
    margin-top: 20px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .gutter-30px {
    padding-left: 15px;
    padding-right: 15px;
  }
  .gutter-30px &gt; .row {
    margin-right: -15px;
    margin-left: -15px;
  }
  .gutter-30px &gt; .row &gt; .col, .gutter-30px &gt; .row &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-left: 15px;
    padding-right: 15px;
  }
  .gutter-30px__vertical-spacer {
    margin-top: 30px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .gutter-40px {
    padding-left: 20px;
    padding-right: 20px;
  }
  .gutter-40px &gt; .row {
    margin-right: -20px;
    margin-left: -20px;
  }
  .gutter-40px &gt; .row &gt; .col, .gutter-40px &gt; .row &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-left: 20px;
    padding-right: 20px;
  }
  .gutter-40px__vertical-spacer {
    margin-top: 40px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .gutter-50px {
    padding-left: 25px;
    padding-right: 25px;
  }
  .gutter-50px &gt; .row {
    margin-right: -25px;
    margin-left: -25px;
  }
  .gutter-50px &gt; .row &gt; .col, .gutter-50px &gt; .row &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-left: 25px;
    padding-right: 25px;
  }
  .gutter-50px__vertical-spacer {
    margin-top: 50px;
  }
}

.smart-row {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}
.smart-row &gt; .col:first-child, .smart-row &gt; [class*=col-]:first-child {
  padding-left: 0;
}
.smart-row &gt; .col:last-child, .smart-row &gt; [class*=col-]:last-child {
  padding-right: 0;
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
  .smart-row &gt; .col, .smart-row &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-right: 0 !important;
    padding-left: 0 !important;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .smart-gutter-0px {
    margin-top: 0px;
  }
  .smart-gutter-0px:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
  }
  .smart-gutter-0px &gt; .col, .smart-gutter-0px &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-left: 0px;
    padding-right: 0px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .smart-gutter-12px {
    margin-top: 12px;
  }
  .smart-gutter-12px:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
  }
  .smart-gutter-12px &gt; .col, .smart-gutter-12px &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-left: 6px;
    padding-right: 6px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .smart-gutter-20px {
    margin-top: 20px;
  }
  .smart-gutter-20px:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
  }
  .smart-gutter-20px &gt; .col, .smart-gutter-20px &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 10px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .smart-gutter-30px {
    margin-top: 30px;
  }
  .smart-gutter-30px:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
  }
  .smart-gutter-30px &gt; .col, .smart-gutter-30px &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-left: 15px;
    padding-right: 15px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .smart-gutter-40px {
    margin-top: 40px;
  }
  .smart-gutter-40px:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
  }
  .smart-gutter-40px &gt; .col, .smart-gutter-40px &gt; [class*=col-] {
    padding-left: 20px;
    padding-right: 20px;
  }
}

.block-AirspaceAccordionBlock {
  max-width: 1440px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.accordion-block__item {
  border-bottom: 2px white solid;
}
.accordion-block__item__control {
  background-color: #f0f0f0;
  position: relative;
}
.accordion-block__item__btn {
  display: block;
  line-height: 1rem;
}
.accordion-block__item__btn, .accordion-block__item__btn:visited, .accordion-block__item__btn:active, .accordion-block__item__btn:hover, .accordion-block__item__btn:focus {
  color: #0072a8;
}
.accordion-block__item__btn:hover, .accordion-block__item__btn:active {
  text-decoration: none;
}
.accordion-block__item__btn .icon-fa {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 3rem;
  line-height: 2rem;
  padding: 20px 15px 15px 15px;
  text-align: center;
  height: 60px;
  width: 60px;
  background-color: #0072a8;
  color: #f1d384;
}
.accordion-block__item__btn .icon-fa:before {
  content: "";
  /* fa-arrow-circle-down */
}
.accordion-block__item__btn.collapsed {
  color: #333333;
}
.accordion-block__item__btn.collapsed .icon-fa {
  background-color: #c8c8c8;
  color: #f0f0f0;
}
.accordion-block__item__btn.collapsed .icon-fa:before {
  content: "";
  /* fa-arrow-circle-right */
}
.accordion-block__item__title {
  padding-left: 1rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  line-height: 1.8rem;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-45%);
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .accordion-block__item__title {
    padding: 1rem;
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    line-height: 2rem;
  }
}
.accordion-block__item__content .rich-text {
  padding: 2rem;
}

.block-AirspaceCenteredImageCarouselBlock {
  max-width: 1600px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.cic-block {
  overflow-x: hidden;
  position: relative;
}
.cic-block__carousel-wrapper {
  transition: transform 0.5s linear;
  position: relative;
}
.cic-block__carousel-item {
  position: relative;
}
@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .cic-block__carousel-item {
    padding-right: 20px;
  }
}
.cic-block__carousel-item__caption {
  padding: 20px;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  line-height: 2.4rem;
  background-color: #f0f0f0;
  visibility: hidden;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .cic-block__carousel-item__caption {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    line-height: 2.8rem;
  }
}
.cic-block__carousel-item__photo-credit {
  font-style: italic;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  line-height: 1.6rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  margin-top: 11px;
}
.cic-block__carousel-item.active .cic-block__carousel-item__caption, .cic-block__carousel-item.animating .cic-block__carousel-item__caption {
  visibility: visible;
}
.cic-block__carousel-item__zoom {
  display: none;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .cic-block__carousel-item__zoom {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    right: 20px;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54);
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #ffffff;
    font-size: 2rem;
    line-height: 40px;
    padding-left: 11px;
  }
}
.cic-block .cic-block__carousel-control {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  text-align: center;
  opacity: 0.7;
}
.cic-block .cic-block__carousel-control__icon {
  height: 25px;
  width: auto;
  margin: 12.5px 0;
}
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .cic-block .cic-block__carousel-control {
    width: 80px;
    height: 80px;
  }
  .cic-block .cic-block__carousel-control__icon {
    height: 40px;
    margin: 20px 0;
  }
}
.cic-block .cic-block__carousel-control--left {
  left: 0;
  cursor: w-resize;
}
.cic-block .cic-block__carousel-control--right {
  right: 0;
  cursor: e-resize;
}

.block-AirspaceCarouselWithBottomThumbnailsBlock {
  max-width: 1440px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.carousel-wbt-block__slide {
  position: relative;
}
.carousel-wbt-block__slide:not(.active) {
  display: none;
}
.carousel-wbt-block__slide__image {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
.carousel-wbt-block__slide__info {
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #767676;
  color: #ffffff;
  padding: 16px 20px;
}
@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .carousel-wbt-block__slide__info {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    height: 95px;
    background-color: #000000;
    opacity: 0.5;
  }
}
.carousel-wbt-block__slide__info__caption {
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  line-height: 2rem;
}
.carousel-wbt-block__slide__info__photo-credit {
  font-style: italic;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  line-height: 1.6rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  margin-top: 11px;
}
.carousel-wbt-block__slide__info__zoom {
  display: none;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .carousel-wbt-block__slide__info__zoom {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 95px;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54);
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #ffffff;
    font-size: 2rem;
    line-height: 40px;
    padding-left: 11px;
  }
}
.carousel-wbt-block__thumbnail-wrapper {
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  margin-top: 10px;
}
.carousel-wbt-block__thumbnail {
  background-color: #000000;
  border-right: #ffffff 2px solid;
  cursor: pointer;
  width: 25%;
  height: 50px;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .carousel-wbt-block__thumbnail {
    height: 68px;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .carousel-wbt-block__thumbnail {
    height: 85px;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1440px) {
  .carousel-wbt-block__thumbnail {
    height: 100px;
  }
}
.carousel-wbt-block__thumbnail img {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  position: relative;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
}
.carousel-wbt-block__thumbnail:not(.active) img {
  opacity: 0.5;
}
.carousel-wbt-block .carousel-wbt-block__thumbnails__carousel-control {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  text-align: center;
  opacity: 0.7;
}
.carousel-wbt-block .carousel-wbt-block__thumbnails__carousel-control__icon {
  height: 25px;
  width: auto;
  margin: 12.5px 0;
}
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .carousel-wbt-block .carousel-wbt-block__thumbnails__carousel-control {
    width: 80px;
    height: 80px;
  }
  .carousel-wbt-block .carousel-wbt-block__thumbnails__carousel-control__icon {
    height: 40px;
    margin: 20px 0;
  }
}
.carousel-wbt-block .carousel-wbt-block__thumbnails__carousel-control--left {
  left: 0;
  cursor: w-resize;
}
.carousel-wbt-block .carousel-wbt-block__thumbnails__carousel-control--right {
  right: 0;
  cursor: e-resize;
}
.carousel-wbt-block .carousel-wbt-block__thumbnails__carousel-control {
  background-color: transparent;
}

    padding-right: 50px;
  }

    padding-left: calc((100% - 1340px)/2);
    padding-right: calc((100% - 1340px)/2);
  }
}

  text-align: center;
}

  padding-right: 10px;

    padding-right: 0;
  }

  margin: 0 auto;

.hero-image-block__slide {
  position: relative;
}
.hero-image-block__slide__image {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
.hero-image-block__slide__info {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54);
  color: #ffffff;
  padding: 16px 18px;
}
.hero-image-block__slide__info--zoom {
  padding-right: 45px;
}
@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .hero-image-block__slide__info {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    right: 0;
  }
}
.hero-image-block__slide__info__caption {
  font-size: 1.7rem;
  line-height: 2rem;
  font-weight: 200;
}
.hero-image-block__slide__info__photo-credit {
  font-style: italic;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  line-height: 1.6rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  margin-top: 11px;
}
.hero-image-block__slide__info__zoom {
  display: none;
}
@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .hero-image-block__slide__info__zoom {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54);
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #ffffff;
    font-size: 2rem;
    line-height: 40px;
    padding-left: 11px;
  }
}

  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin: 12px 10px;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .hero-image-block__slide__info__zoom--no-caption {
    bottom: 0;
  }
}

.content &gt; .block-AirspaceImageCardBlock {
  max-width: 1440px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

  padding-left: 20px;
  padding-right: 20px;
}

  .content &gt; .block-AirspaceImageCardBlock .image-card-block {
    padding-left: 50px;
    padding-right: 50px;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1440px) {
  .content &gt; .block-AirspaceImageCardBlock .image-card-block {
    padding-left: calc((100% - 1340px)/2);
    padding-right: calc((100% - 1340px)/2);
  }
}

.image-card-block {
  background-color: #f0f0f0;
  border: 0;
  border-top: 4px solid #949895;
}
.image-card-block__zoom {
  display: none;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .image-card-block__zoom {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54);
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #ffffff;
    font-size: 2rem;
    line-height: 40px;
    padding-left: 11px;
  }
}
.image-card-block__zoom__icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin: 12px 10px;
}
.image-card-block__body {
  padding: 2rem;
  max-width: 768px;
}
.image-card-block__body__title {
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  line-height: 1.4444;
  font-weight: bold;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .image-card-block__body__title {
    font-size: 1.6rem;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .image-card-block__body__title {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
  }
}
.image-card-block__body__description {
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  line-height: 1.55555;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .image-card-block__body__description {
    font-size: 1.4rem;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1440px) {
  .image-card-block__body__description {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
  }
}
.image-card-block__link {
  background-color: inherit;
  color: #003b4c;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  line-height: 3.2rem;
  letter-spacing: -0.03rem;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.image-card-block__link__arrow {
  color: #D14900;
}
.image-card-block.text-on-right {
  border: 0;
  background-color: unset;
  flex-direction: row;
}
.image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body {
  padding: 0 2rem;
  width: 45%;
}
.image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper {
  width: 55%;
}
.col-md-6 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-7 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-8 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-9 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-10 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-11 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-12 .image-card-block.text-on-right {
  flex-direction: column;
}
.col-md-6 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-7 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-8 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-9 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-10 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-11 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-12 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper {
  width: 100%;
}
.col-md-6 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-7 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-8 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-9 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-10 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-11 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-12 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body {
  padding: 1rem 0 0 0;
  width: 100%;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .col-md-6 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-7 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-8 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-9 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-10 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-11 .image-card-block.text-on-right, .col-md-12 .image-card-block.text-on-right {
    flex-direction: row;
  }
  .col-md-6 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-7 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-8 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-9 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-10 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-11 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body, .col-md-12 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body {
    padding: 0 2rem;
    width: 45%;
  }
  .col-md-6 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-7 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-8 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-9 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-10 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-11 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-12 .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__wrapper {
    width: 55%;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1440px) {
  .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body__title {
    font-size: 2.4rem;
    line-height: 3rem;
  }
}
.image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body__description {
  margin: 0;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body__description {
    font-size: 1.6rem;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .image-card-block.text-on-right .image-card-block__body__description {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
  }
}
.image-card-block.text-on-left {
  border: 0;
  background-color: unset;
  flex-direction: row;
}
.image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__body {
  padding: 0 2rem;
  width: 45%;
}
.image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__wrapper {
  width: 55%;
}
.col-md-6 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-7 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-8 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-9 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-10 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-11 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-12 .image-card-block.text-on-left {
  flex-direction: column;
}
.col-md-6 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-7 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-8 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-9 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-10 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-11 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__wrapper, .col-md-12 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__wrapper {
  width: 100%;
}
.col-md-6 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__body, .col-md-7 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__body, .col-md-8 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__body, .col-md-9 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__body, .col-md-10 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__body, .col-md-11 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__body, .col-md-12 .image-card-block.text-on-left .image-card-block__body {
  padding: 1rem 0 0 0;
  width: 100%;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .col-md-6 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-7 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-8 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-9 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-10 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-11 .image-card-block.text-on-left, .col-md-12 .image-card-block.text-on-left {

  }

    width: 45%;
  }

    line-height: 3rem;
  }

  max-width: 1440px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.image-carousel {
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
}
.image-carousel__carousel-item {
  text-align: center;
}
.image-carousel__wrapper-link .wrapper-expander {
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 100;
}
.image-carousel__image-wrapper, .image-carousel__image-title-wrapper {
  position: relative;
}
.image-carousel__image {
  height: inherit;
  width: 100%;
}
.image-carousel__text-gradient {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  opacity: 0.8;
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(-180deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 60%, #000000 100%);
  background-image: linear-gradient(-180deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 60%, #000000 100%);
}

  .image-carousel__text-gradient {
    background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(-180deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%, #000000 100%);
    background-image: linear-gradient(-180deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%, #000000 100%);
  }
}

  background-color: #1b1b1b;
  text-align: center;
  font-weight: bold;

  line-height: 2.6rem;

  padding-top: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 20px;
}

    background-color: unset;

    padding-bottom: 0;
  }
}

  text-decoration: none;
}

}

  display: block;

}
.action-buttons-block__button {
  color: #ffffff;
  background-color: #0072a8;
  border-color: #0072a8;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  margin: 10px 0;
  width: 100%;
}

  color: white;
  margin-left: 5px;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
}

.stats-block {
  background-color: #f0f0f0;
  padding: 2em;
}

  .stats-block {
    padding: 5em;
  }
}
.stats-block__title {
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}
.stats-block__title--centered {
  text-align: center;
}
.stats-block__content__stat {
  padding: 5em 4em;
  background-color: #ffffff;
}
@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .stats-block__content__stat {
    width: 32%;
    margin: 0;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .stats-block__content__stat {
    width: 23.5%;
  }
}
.stats-block__content__stat__stat {
  font-weight: normal;
  font-size: 6rem;
  line-height: 7rem;
  color: #949895;
}
.stats-block__content__stat__desc {
  font-weight: 300;
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  line-height: 2.6rem;
  color: #383838;
}
.stats-block__content__stat:before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  height: 4px;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(90deg, #f9be01 0%, #c75000 100%);
  background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, #f9be01 0%, #c75000 100%);
}
.stats-block .carousel-item-next,
.stats-block .carousel-item-prev {
  top: inherit;
}
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .stats-block__carousel-control {
    display: none !important;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .short .stats-block__carousel-control {
    display: none !important;
  }
}
.stats-block__carousel-control__icon {
  height: 20px;
  width: 10px;
}
.left .stats-block__carousel-control__icon {
  margin-left: 20px;
}
.right .stats-block__carousel-control__icon {
  margin-right: 20px;
}
@media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 1023px) {
  .stats-block {
    /* left or forward direction */
    /* farthest right hidden item must be absolute position for animations */
    /* right or prev direction */
  }
  .stats-block .carousel-inner .active,
.stats-block .carousel-inner .active + .carousel-item,
.stats-block .carousel-inner .active + .carousel-item + .carousel-item {
    display: block;
  }
  .stats-block .carousel-inner .carousel-item.active:not(.carousel-item-right):not(.carousel-item-left),
.stats-block .carousel-inner .carousel-item.active:not(.carousel-item-right):not(.carousel-item-left) + .carousel-item,
.stats-block .carousel-inner .carousel-item.active:not(.carousel-item-right):not(.carousel-item-left) + .carousel-item + .carousel-item {
    transition: none;
  }
  .stats-block .carousel-inner .carousel-item-next,
.stats-block .carousel-inner .carousel-item-prev {
    position: relative;
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  }
  .stats-block .carousel-inner .active.carousel-item + .carousel-item + .carousel-item + .carousel-item {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: -33.3333%;
    z-index: -1;
    display: block;
    visibility: visible;
  }
  .stats-block .active.carousel-item-left + .carousel-item-next.carousel-item-left,
.stats-block .carousel-item-next.carousel-item-left + .carousel-item,
.stats-block .carousel-item-next.carousel-item-left + .carousel-item + .carousel-item,
.stats-block .carousel-item-next.carousel-item-left + .carousel-item + .carousel-item + .carousel-item {
    position: relative;
    transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);
    visibility: visible;
  }
  .stats-block .carousel-inner .carousel-item-prev.carousel-item-right {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    z-index: -1;
    display: block;
    visibility: visible;
  }
  .stats-block .active.carousel-item-right + .carousel-item-prev.carousel-item-right,
.stats-block .carousel-item-prev.carousel-item-right + .carousel-item,
.stats-block .carousel-item-prev.carousel-item-right + .carousel-item + .carousel-item,
.stats-block .carousel-item-prev.carousel-item-right + .carousel-item + .carousel-item + .carousel-item {
    position: relative;
    transform: translate3d(100%, 0, 0);
    visibility: visible;
    display: block;
    visibility: visible;
  }
}

.block-AirspaceTabsBlock {
  max-width: 1600px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.tabs-block .nav-tabs {
  border: none;
}
.tabs-block .nav-item {
  margin-bottom: 0;
}
.tabs-block__content__pane {
  width: 100%;
}
.tabs-block__tabs__item {
  width: 100%;
  margin: 2rem 0 0;
}
.tabs-block__tabs__item__link {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  color: #4a4a4a !important;
  line-height: 3.7rem;
  border: 0 !important;
  border-bottom: 4px solid #644b78 !important;
}
.tabs-block__tabs__item__link.active .tabs-block__tabs__item__link__icon {
  color: #b54900 !important;
}
.tabs-block__tabs__item__link.active {
  color: #b54900 !important;
  border-bottom: 4px solid #0072a8 !important;
  position: relative;
}
.tabs-block__tabs__item__link.active:after, .tabs-block__tabs__item__link.active:before {
  bottom: -4px;
  left: 50%;
  border: solid transparent;
  content: " ";
  height: 0;
  width: 0;
  position: absolute;
  pointer-events: none;
}
.tabs-block__tabs__item__link.active:after {
  border-bottom-color: #ffffff;
  border-width: 12px;
  margin-left: -12px;
}
.tabs-block__tabs__item__link.active:before {
  border-bottom-color: #0072a8;
  border-width: 18px;
  margin-left: -18px;
}
.tabs-block__tabs__item__link__icon {
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  line-height: 3.2rem;
  color: #4a4a4a !important;
}
@media (min-width: 480px) {
  .tabs-block__tabs__item {
    width: auto;
    min-width: 20%;
    margin-right: 15px;
    margin-top: 0;
  }
  .tabs-block__tabs__item:last-child {
    margin-right: 0;
  }
  .tabs-block--centered .tabs-block__tabs__item {
    min-width: auto;
    margin-right: 20px;
  }
  .tabs-block--centered .tabs-block__tabs__item__link {
    padding-left: 40px;
    padding-right: 40px;
  }
  .tabs-block__tabs__item__link {
    font-size: 2.2rem;
  }
}
@media print {
  .tabs-block .tab-pane {
    display: block !important;
    opacity: 1 !important;
  }
}

  width: 100%;
}

  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  opacity: 0.8;
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(-180deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 60%, #000000 100%);

}

  }

}

  background-color: #005851;
}

  padding: 0;
}

  height: 100%;
  position: relative;
}

  height: 100%;
}

  height: auto;
  width: 100%;
}

  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  opacity: 0.8;
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(-180deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 60%, #000000 100%);
  background-image: linear-gradient(-180deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 60%, #000000 100%);
}

  .sic-header__text-gradient {
    background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(-180deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%, #000000 100%);
    background-image: linear-gradient(-180deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%, #000000 100%);
  }
}

  font-style: italic;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  line-height: 1.6rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  color: #ffffff;
  z-index: 10;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 2px;
  right: 10px;

    bottom: 5px;
  }

    right: 20px;
  }

  left: 0;

  border: 2px solid #ffffff;

    margin-right: 0;
  }
}

  font-size: 1.4rem;
  margin-left: 5px;
  top: 0;
}
.sic-header .sic-header__carousel__carousel-control {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  text-align: center;
  opacity: 0.7;
}
.sic-header .sic-header__carousel__carousel-control__icon {
  height: 25px;
  width: auto;
  margin: 12.5px 0;
}
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .sic-header .sic-header__carousel__carousel-control {
    width: 80px;
    height: 80px;
  }
  .sic-header .sic-header__carousel__carousel-control__icon {
    height: 40px;
    margin: 20px 0;
  }
}
.sic-header .sic-header__carousel__carousel-control--left {
  left: 0;
  cursor: w-resize;
}
.sic-header .sic-header__carousel__carousel-control--right {
  right: 0;
  cursor: e-resize;
}
.sic-header__page-info {
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(-226deg, #003b4c 0%, #005851 100%);
  background-image: linear-gradient(-226deg, #003b4c 0%, #005851 100%);
  padding-left: 20px;
  padding-right: 20px;
  padding-top: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 20px;
  color: #ffffff;
}

  .sic-header__page-info {
    padding-left: 50px;
    padding-right: 50px;
  }
}

    padding-right: calc((100% - 1340px)/2);
  }

    padding-top: 40px;
    padding-bottom: 40px;
  }

  max-width: 1400px;
}

  background-color: transparent;
}

  position: absolute;
  right: 20px;
  top: 20px;
  z-index: 100;
  opacity: 1;
  text-shadow: none;
}

  font-size: 5rem;
  color: #ffffff;
  font-weight: 100;
}
.lightbox__body {
  padding: 0;
}
.lightbox__carousel__indicators {
  margin: 0;
  right: unset;
  bottom: 10px;
  left: 10px;
}

  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  margin: 0 5px;
  cursor: pointer;
  background-color: #ffffff;
  border-radius: 12px;
}

  border: 2px solid #ffffff;
}

    left: 50px;
  }
}

  margin: 0 3px;
}
